name: meetcat
description: Auto-join Google Meet meetings with Chrome Extension and Tauri desktop app

scripts.build:shared: pnpm --filter @meetcat/settings build && pnpm --filter @meetcat/settings-ui build && pnpm --filter @meetcat/core build
scripts.test: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm -r test && pnpm --filter @meetcat/tauri test:rust
scripts.test:cov: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm -r test:coverage && pnpm --filter @meetcat/tauri test:rust
scripts.clean:all: pnpm -r clean && rm -rf node_modules .turbo packages/tauri/src-tauri/target && find packages -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +
